p: Dried flowers were ground and extracted, using a reflux apparatus, for 3 h, with 10 volumes of 95% ethanol, at 80 °C. The extract was filtered and concentrated under reduced pressure, using a rotary vacuum evaporator. The concentrated extract was then freeze-dried to obtain a powdered extract (extraction yield: 6.67%). The powdered extract was stored at 4 °C until use.
